column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Asami says : " Hey , is Mako all right ?
#Text=" Asami says : " I know , but , he 's your brother .
#Text=Do you think that he likes Korra as more than just a friend ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " W - What ?
#Text=No !
#Text=That 's , just gossip , where 'd you hear that ?
#Text=Crazy talk is coming out of your mouth right now .
#Text=Heh ... " Asami says : " What do you know , Bolin ?
#Text=Come on , spill it .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Nothing !
#Text=I mean , there was this one time during the tournament when Mako and Korra kissed , but - " Asami says : " They ... kissed ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Believe me , I was upset too , but , I 'm over it .
#Text=I do n't think it meant anything .
#Text=" Asami says : " I doubt that .
#Text=" Lin says : " Hide !
#Text=" Equalist traffic director says : " That tram goes to the training camp .
#Text=" Female Equalist says : " Everything was delivered to the prison , sir .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " That 's where they must be keeping Korra .
#Text=" Lin says : " We need to get down that tunnel .
#Text=" Equalist says : " It 's empty !
#Text=" Equalist says : " Yeah , I can see that .
#Text=" Lin says : " You two , keep an eye on them .
#Text=" Lin says : " My officers are inside .
#Text=" Mako says : " What about Korra ?
#Text=" Lin says : " I do n't see her yet .
#Text=" Mako says : " Avatar Korra .
#Text=Where are you keeping her ?
#Text="
